ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: `onlyOwner` modifier restricts the `changeOwner` and `execute` functions to be used by the owner only.
ImplementedSecurityControls.OwnershipVerification: `acceptOwnership` requires the new owner to explicitly accept ownership, adding an additional step to prevent accidental ownership changes.

FallbackFunctionality: No fallback function is defined in this contract. If implemented, it would require additional security checks to avoid unauthorized access.
